colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES RNAM PAR 'DREN PA'I DBANG PHYUG MTSUNGS ZLA MCHIS PA ^'JAM @008A *, ,MGON BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED LCANG LUNG PAndI TA HO THOG THU NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I 'KHRUNGS RABS DANG 'BREL BA'I GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS SMON TSIGS DANG BCAS PA 'DOD 'BYUNG DPAG BSAM LJON PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, DKA' BCU 'JIGS MED BZANG PO GNYIS KYI GDONG DU DAM PA GANG GI PHYAG MDZOD T'A BLA MA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS SOGS GRVA RIGS THUN MONGS NAS GTAGS, GSER GYI ME TOG GIS SPRAS PA'I DNGUL DKAR GYI MAndAL DAR TSON SNA LNGA'I SNE 'DOGS CAN, GOS CHEN SPU MA GSER GYI 'BRUG RIS @008B MA BCAS KYI RTEN DANG BCAS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR, RANG NYID 'CHI BA PA KUN GYI SKYES BUR, LGOG GYUR SPYOD PA'I NUS PA MA MCHINGS PAS, GSANG BA ZAB MO'I GNAS RNAMS BRJOD PAR MI SPOBS MOD KYANG, BSKUL BA PO RNAMS KYI NGO MA LDOG PAR BLA MA DANG, LHAG PA'I LHA LA GSOL BRTZE GCIG TU BTAB STE ^SH'AKYA'I @009A *, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG TU 'BOD PA'I SNYOMS LAS GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS, RANG GI BSAM GTAN GYI BSTI GNAS DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB GLING DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
